branchCategory.name: VQC4000, 5 Port Solenoid Valve, Base Mounted, Single Unit
branchCategory.description: <p>The VQC series subplate, single unit has five standard wiring packages bringing a world of ease to wiring and maintenance work, while the protective enclosures of three of them conform to IP67 standards for protection from dust and moisture. The VQC series has outstanding response times and long life. </p>
